1011011100000000 1100101000111110 0 -> sum: 1000000100111110, cout: 1

1010010100011110 1101100000000001 1 -> sum: 0111110100100000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
